mission-wo-053.instruction: PR for mission-wo-053 Request Changes: Please update 'tests/systems/test_technology_manager.py' to use 'FirmTechInfoDTO' objects instead of raw dicts in 'test_unlock_and_visionary_adoption', to maintain consistency with the actual application usage in 'main.py'.

final-verify-p23.instruction: Perform a comprehensive verification of the current main branch. 1. Run scripts/verify_td_111.py and scripts/trace_leak.py. 2. Confirm Zero Leak status and M2 reporting accuracy. 3. Summarize the initial economic state including HCI and productivity gains from WO-053. 4. Save the final report to communications/insights/2026-01-27_Final_Verification_Report.md.
final-verify-p23.title: Final Verification: Integrated Core & P23

mission-holy-ledger.instruction: Remediate TD-127/128/129/130 by enforcing SettlementSystem for all cash moves. MANDATORY: Remove RefluxSystem entirely and migrate its 'money capture' logic into SettlementSystem's zero-sum tracking as per HOLY_LEDGER_REMEDIATION_SPEC.md.
mission-holy-ledger.title: Track A: Holy Ledger & Reflux Deprecation
